author: Anonymous Poet
title: Rainbow circle loading all the time for "Search in help desk"
question: This is more of a technical problem, but how can I get my computer to stop getting stuck whenever I want to use "search in help desk" on DrRacket? Every time, it always gets frozen and I have a particularly new-ish Mac computer too, so I just have to search the Help Desk manually. Does anyone else have this technical issue with DrRacket too?
